title: If there is no data for series, it should display a friendly error message
description: When there is no data available for a series in a chart, a friendly error message should be displayed to remind the user.
OB: Currently, when there is no data for a series in a chart, no error message is displayed.
EB: If there is no data for a series in a chart, a friendly error message should be displayed to notify the user.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a chart. 2. Set the data definition for the chart. 3. Select a column that does not contain any data.
